property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, turn it face down in your card pool. Face down cards cannot go to your momentum. F Commit: Face down cards in your card pool are not cleared as normal until the End Phase of your next turn (they stay in your card pool). R Discard up to 2 face down cards from your card pool: After your Combat Phase begins, attacks you play this turn get +X damage. X equals the number of face down cards you discarded from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard up to 3 face down cards from your card pool: Attacks you attempt to play this turn get -X difficulty. X equals the number of face down cards you discarded from your card pool for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 face down card from your card pool: Until the end of this turn, attacks you play get +1 damage. Alex F Destroy this asset, discard up to 2 face down cards from your card pool: Until the end of this turn, cards you attempt to play get -X difficulty. X equals the number of face down cards you discarded from your card pool when using this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 asset: If this attack deals damage, destroy up to 2 of your opponent's assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this attack resolves, turn it facedown. E: This attack gets +1 damage. If you have discarded any face down cards from your card pool this Combat Phase, this attack gets an additional +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack gets +X damage when it is played. X equals double the number of face down cards you have discarded from your card pool this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit: Face down cards in your card pool are not cleared as normal until the End Phase of your next turn (they stay in your card pool). First F Destroy this foundation: Discard up to 2 face down cards from your card pool. Attacks you play this turn get -X difficulty. X equals the number of face down cards you discarded for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 face down card from your card pool: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you calculate block difficulty to block an opponent's attack, face down cards in your card pool do not count toward the block difficulty. Alex R Destroy this foundation: Before you attempt to play a card, face down cards in your card pool do not count toward progressive difficulty. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent blocks your punch attack, discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is a punch attack, negate the block and discard it. Your opponent may attempt another block. E Commit 2 foundations: Your next check to play a punch attack this turn gets +4.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation, destroy 1 asset: The check to play your next attack this turn gets +X. X equals the difficulty of the asset you destroyed for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, the next check to play a punch attack this turn gets +X. X equals the amount of damage your attack dealt. {Chaos} Character First F Destroy this asset: Gain X vitality. X equals the number of ready foundations in your staging area. You may not play attacks for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, the next control check you make to play a non-attack card this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, the next control check you make this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +4 damage. Only playable if you have at least 2 other punch attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your punch attack deals damage, the next check you make to play a punch attack this turn gets +2. {Chaos} Character F Destroy this foundation: Take All punch attacks from your card pool and add them to your hand. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you make a control check, you may commit assets to pass the control check as if they were foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your punch attack gets +2 damage. {Chaos} E Commit 1 foundation: If your punch attack deals damage, your next punch attack gets +1 damage for every punch attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, discard 1 kick and 1 card played as a block from your card pool. Only playable during your opponent's turn. Playable while committed. R Commit: After your opponent's second form during their turn resolves, you may play 1 non-action from your hand as a form.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an attack, discard All cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's card pool. Only playable if you have taken damage this turn. Chun-Li F Destroy this asset: During your opponent's next Draw Step, you may draw up to your hand size as though it were your turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Until the end of this turn, before your opponent's card effect would destroy one of your committed foundations, it is readied instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage during your opponent's turn, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack or any of its multiple copies deal damage, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you attempt to play an attack as a reversal to a blocked attack, it gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack played as a reversal deals damage, add one card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays a non-attack card as their first form of their turn, discard that card from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Switch your attack's damage and speed. E Commit X foundations: This attack gets +X or -X speed (your choice).

card.name: Your Mind is Known to Me

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays their first card this turn, your opponent must keep their hand revealed until the end of the turn. As long as this is the only card in your card pool, you may play it as a block as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed. If your opponent has more cards in their hand than their hand size, your attack gets an additional +2 speed. Dhalsim E Commit: Switch this attack's speed and damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand minus their hand size (minimum 0).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals your opponent's hand size minus 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, the next ranged attack you play this turn gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand minus the number of cards in your hand (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals half of this attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 speed. If it is blocked, the next attack you play this turn gets +4 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, ready 1 of your opponent's foundations: Your oppenent's attack gets +2 speed. Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Reduce this attack's speed to X. X equals half the attack's printed speed (rounded up). E Destroy this foundation: Your opponent discards cards until they have the same number of cards or less in their hand as you have in yours. Only playable if you have at least 4 cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 damage. E: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. Only playable if your shares at least two symbols with your character. E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gains a keyword (your choice) that it does not already have (except throw). If the keyword requires a rating that rating is 1. Only playable if your attack shares at least 3 symbols with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Choose a resource symbol. For the rest of this turn, your character gains this resource symbol. E Commit X foundations: Your attack gets a speed bonus equal to double X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +3 speed. Elena E Destroy this asset: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage. E Commit 2 foundations: This attack gets +4 damage. Only playable if this attack shares at least two symbols with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -X damage and +X speed. X may not be greater than 4.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Only playable if you have at least 2 other non-throw attacks in your card pool. {Death} Character E: If this attack or any of its multiple copies deals damage, destroy 1 card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. Only playable if this attack shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character. Elena E Commit: If this attack deals damage, add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum. Only playable if this attack shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Your attack gets either +2 damage or +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack either gets +X damage or +X speed. X equals the number of resource symbols your attack shares with your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack either gets +X damage or a speed bonus equal to half of X (rounded down). X equals your momentum plus the number of attacks in your card pool. Elena E Commit: Choose a resource symbol. For the rest of this attack, your character gains the chosen resource symbol.

property.name: CardText
property.value: During your End Phase when you would clear any asset or foundation you played as a block, you may discard 1 of your momentum to add that card to your staging area. E Commit: Before you attempt to block an attack, you may use any card with a block in your staging area as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: Before your opponent's End Phase begins, add All of the foundations and assets you played as blocks this turn to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, you may add the card you blocked with either to your hand or to your momentum. Guile E Destroy this asset: Add up to X blocks from your staging area to your hand. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: After you block your opponent's attack with this card, the control check to play your next block this turn gets +X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. Attacks that have a block zone which matches their attack zone may not be used to block this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you may add 1 block from your staging area to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you block your opponent's attack, add the card you blocked with to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: If you completely block this attack, your opponent discarded X cards. X equals the block modifier of the block card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 foundation or asset with a block zone that matches this attack's block zone from your staging area to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals your current vitality divided by 8 (rounded up). R: After you play a foundation, draw 1 card. If this ability has been played more than once this turn, commit this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next throw attack gets -X to its difficulty. X equals your current vitality divided by 2 (rounded up). Only playable if your vitality is 10 or less.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: After you play a foundation, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn while it is in your card pool, draw 1 card after you play a foundation (not as a block).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage and you have 4 or more foundations in your staging area, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, your next attack this turn gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this foundation into your card pool, draw 1 card. {Earth} Character E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals your current vitality divided by 10 (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a foundation, draw 2 cards. You may not draw any more cards this turn. {Earth} Character E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, lose X vitality: During the Block Step, this attack is considered to be completely blocked. X equals half of this attack's damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: After your opponent has played their second enhance during this attack, no more abilities may be played during this attack's Enhance Phase. E Commit 1 foundation: Make a control check. If the check is a 2 or less, draw 2 cards and your opponent may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays a form ability that is at least their second this turn from a card in their staging area, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: M. Bison E Commit: Make a control check. If that check is a 2 or less, you draw 3 cards and your opponent may draw up to 2 cards. The following response's effects cannot be canceled. R Destroy this asset: After your opponent plays a response that is at least their third this turn, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, whenever you cancel an opponent's card effect or destroy one of your opponent's cards in their staging area, you may draw a card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: The next enhance played this Enhance Phase is canceled.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, reveal a card from your hand. If the revealed card has a control of 2 or less, draw 2 cards. Your opponent may also draw 1 card. {All} Character E: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays an enhance ability from a card in their staging area, destroy that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays a form ability from a card in their staging area, destroy that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays a response ability on a card in their staging area, cancel its effects and destroy that card.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: F Destroy 2 foundations: Destroy 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, reveal an attack in your hand: Your opponent's attack gets -X damage. X equals the control of the revealed card. E: If your opponent has 4 or more cards in their hand, before you take damage from this attack, you may attempt to play a Reversal from your hand and resolve it. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals double the number of cards in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your may attempt to play a Reversal to your opponent's attack even if you do not block it. R. Mika E Destroy this asset: Your attack played as a reversal gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards in your card pool and your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage, X equals the number of cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, it gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 3 foundations: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your throw attack gets +X damage. X equals the highest block modifier in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards in your card pool and your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: If your opponent's attack's damage is higher than your current vitality, reduce that attack's damage to 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Reveal your hand. If 2 or more copies of the same card are revealed this way, commit 2 foundations or assets in your opponent's staging area. E Commit: If your attack deals damage, destroy a foundation that has more than 1 copy in play in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard X momentum: Your opponent draws X cards, and then you draw a number of cards equal to double X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 card. If the discarded card is a copy of a card in your opponent's discard pile, they discard an additional card. Only playable if your opponent has 4 or more cards in hand. Remy E Destroy this asset: Draw X cards. X equals the number of different foundations with more than 1 copy in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0. E: Each player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: If this attack deals damage, your opponent reveals their hand and discards All copies of each card with more than one copy in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Only playable if there is at least 1 other attack in your card pool. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of different foundations with more than one copy in each player's staging area. Each of this attack's multiple copies also has this enhance.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Your attack gets +5 damage. Only playable if there are at least 2 copies of this foundation in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Your attack gets +5 speed. Only playable if there are at least 2 copies of this foundation in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 damage. For every 2 Hawk tokens on this card, your attack gets an additional +1 damage. Remove 1 Hawk token from this card. First E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 Hawk token to this card. You may only play two more enhances during this attack's Enhance Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +4 damage. In addition, your attack gets +1 damage for each Hawk token on your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. T. Hawk E Destroy this asset: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of Hawk tokens on your character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have any tokens on your character, this attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have any tokens ony our character, this attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Discard X Hawk tokens from your character card: This attack gets +X damage. X equals half of the number of tokens discarded (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before your opponent determines block difficulty, discard the top card of your deck. Your attack's speed becomes X. X equals the control of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Discard X tokens from your character card. Reduce the damage of this attack by X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you completely block your opponent's attack, add 1 Hawk token to this card. E Commit: If this attack deals damage, move All Hawk tokens from this card to your character card. E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage.
